ExecDesc.value: Oracle Database Server XDB PITRIG TRUNCATE and DROP Procedures SQL Injection (IPv6 Version)

EngDesc.value: There exists an SQL injection vulnerability in Oracle Database Server product. The vulnerability exists due to insufficient validation of arguments supplied to procedures PITRIG_TRUNCATE and PITRIG_DROP in XDB.XDB_PITRIG_PKG package. A remote attacker with valid user credentials may leverage this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary SQL code within the security context of the database system administrator. (IPv6 Version)
